summary: A simple amulet of Auriel, found in a strongbox next to Auriel's statue in the Forgotten Vale.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Welcome! I saw a [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2138474-amulet-of-auriel/]request[/url] today in the requests forum asking for an amulet of Auriel, and figured I could whip up something quick.

The file has been cleaned with TES5EDIT, [u]requires Dawnguard[/u], and has no scripts, so it should be safe for everybody to use. Still, you should always make a backup save before installing ANY mod, in case something goes wrong.

Anyway, this amulet can be found in a strongbox next to Auriel's statue in the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Forgotten_Vale]Forgotten Vale[/url]. It fortifies Magicka regeneration and destruction magic. As you can see, it's a quite simple amulet. Perhaps someone else will make something more elaborate in the future. I am not planning on making any updates or changing the magic effects, just so you know.

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Or you can use the Mod Manager to download the mod automatically. To uninstall, simply delete the files from your Data folder, and you're good to go.

Special thanks go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6468/?]Merilia[/url] (AKA Deandra) for free-to-use Additional Amulets - Unenchanted Necklaces, and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34789]Tamira[/url] for the strongbox mesh and texture. Have fun!
